attributes.title: Nope.
attributes.review: Sorry, this app and the people behind it continue to show a blatant disregard for human rights! I can’t give me support to an Oompa Loompa who continues to fund racist and homophobic parts of the world!

attributes.title: Not a useful app.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see his views on how he will be making America better and it keeps showing me trumps leaked nudes and rape cases in my notifications! I only had this app for a day or so and I kept seeing big orange ugly Cheetos all over my phone it was a complete nightmare! It also showed trumps very racist comments and saying that he wants to ban educational apps such as Tik Tok. Not only that but all of my electronics crashed when I tried to delete it! Please fix this issue now I don’t like seeing big orange toes either.
